description: Changes the visibility of class members to public.
description_long: Changes the visibility of class members to public.

description: Checks if the android device is rooted and terminates the application if it is.
description_long: Checks if the android device is rooted and terminates the application if it is.

description: Merges static methods into one method.
description_long: Merges static methods into one method.

description: Replaces method invocations and field references.

only_local.frontend_name: Only encrypt references to local (non-runtime) classes

description_long: Encrypts method calls and field accesses. This task makes it extremely challenging to reverse engineer the application.

description: Removes as much debug information as possible.

keep_signatures.frontend_name: Keep debug information about generic signatures

description_long: Removes debug attributes that are not essential for the JVM to run the application. Makes decompilation more challenging and reduces the application's size.

description: Checks if the application is being debugged and terminates the application if it is.

check_noverify.frontend_name: Check if the application is started with the -noverify flag

description_long: Checks if the application is being debugged and terminates the application if it is.

description: Encapsulates Java runtime classes within wrapper classes to obfuscate them.

no_static_cover.frontend_name: Do not cover static method calls to runtime classes

description_long: Encapsulates Java runtime classes within wrapper classes to obfuscate them.

description: Encrypts all strings and makes them illegible & non-searchable.

min_length.frontend_name: Minimum length of strings to encrypt

max_length.frontend_name: Maximum length of strings to encrypt

description_long: Encrypts string constants. Please note that the demo version does not encrypt any potentially malicious strings such as URLs and file paths.

description: Uses different methods & exploits to crash reverse engineering tools.

folder_trick.frontend_name: Trick file archivers into handling classes as folders

description_long: Crashes reverse engineering tools using various tricks. This should not be used as a standalone protection. Do not use it on applications that are dynamically loaded.

description: Scrambles code but maintains performance and size.
description_long: Converts characters into bit operations and turns logical operations and lambdas into more complex code.

null_byte_trick.frontend_name: Prepend a null byte to class names to trick file archivers

description_long: Renames members of classes to random names. This shrinks the application's size and makes the code more difficult to understand. It is virtually impossible the recover the original names through reverse engineering.

description: Encrypts line numbers and source file information in stacktraces.
description_long: Encrypts the debug information present in stacktraces using a block cipher. Stacktraces can be decrypted using a secret key on our website. This task requires source file and line number attributes.

description: Rearranges the members of classes to make the code less intuitive.
description_long: Rearranges the members of classes to make the code less intuitive.

description: Converts integer and non-integer numbers into complex arithmetic operations.
description_long: Converts integer and non-integer numbers into complex arithmetic operations.

description: Changes the logical code structure to a less understandable one for humans and decompilers.
description_long: Rewrites the control flow to make it more difficult for humans to understand and reverse engineer. As a result, decompilers may struggle to find a suitable control flow graph.

description: Removes unused methods and fields from classes.

entry_points_require_annotation.frontend_name: Only consider methods annotated with @EntryPoint as entry points

keep_unused_classes.frontend_name: Keep unused classes (but still remove their unused members)

error_replacement.frontend_name: Instead of removing unused members completely, replace them with an error message

description_long: Removes unused methods and fields from classes by analyzing the application's call graph.

description: Enhanced protection via dynamic encryption keys passed at runtime, bolstering security against static decryption methods.
description_long: Protects the application from static decryption methods by using dynamic encryption keys which are passed through the application at runtime. When combined with other encryption tasks, it enhances the overall protection.
